dcterms:description: RCTW-17 contains 8,034 training images and 4,229 testing images with scene texts in either Chinese or English. Text instances are multi-oriented and labeled by quadrangles in text-line level.
dcterms:title: RCTW-17

dcterms:creator: C. Yao
X. Bai
W. Liu
Y. Ma
Z. Tu
dcterms:description: MSRA-TD500 contains 300 training images and 200 testing images, including English and Chinese scripts. Text instances are multi-oriented and labeled by rotated rectangles in text-line level.
dcterms:title: MSRA-TD500

dcterms:creator: C. K. Châ€™ng
C. S. Chan
dcterms:description: Total-Text contains 1,255 training images and 300 testing images, including 11,459 text instances (4,907 are curved texts). Text instances are labeled in word-level with polygons.
dcterms:title: Total-Text

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
L. Jin
S. Zhang
C. Luo
S. Zhang
dcterms:description: CTW1500 contains 1,000 training images and 500 testing images, with 10,751 text instances in total, where 3,530 are curved texts. Text instances are annotated in text-line level with 14-point polygons.
dcterms:title: CTW1500

dcterms:creator: J. Tang
Z. Yang
Y. Wang
Q. Zheng
Y. Xu
X. Bai
dcterms:description: DAST1500 is a dense and arbitrary-shaped text detection dataset, which collects commodity images with detailed descriptions of the commodities on small wrinkled packages from the Internet. It contains 1,038 training images and 500 testing images with polygon annotations in text-line level.
dcterms:title: DAST1500

dcterms:creator: A. Gupta
A. Vedaldi
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: SynthText is a synthetic dataset consisting of about 800k synthetic images generated by blending text instances rendered with random fonts, sizes, colors, and orientations in natural images. It is used to pre-train text detection models.
dcterms:title: SynthText
